channel.title: Feature Branches :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: Web Only This textbook was authored for the CIS 400 - Object-Oriented Design, Implementation, and Testing course at Kansas State University. This section describes assignments specific to the Fall 2022 offering of that course. If you are not enrolled in the course, please disregard this section. As we are creating a project iteratively this semester, it is a good chance to practice using feature branches with Git. This is a skill you will likely need to use in your future development efforts and career, and it can help solve many problems you may otherwise encounter when developing a project iteratively.
